postContact.html:
Hey {to.name},

Thank you for contacting MyOrderApp.

We've received your message regarding: '{subject}' and will get back to you shortly.

{text}

Best regards,

The MyOrderApp Team
postContact.subject: MyOrderApp: {subject}
postContact.text:
Hey {to.name},

Thank you for contacting MyOrderApp.

We've received your message regarding: '{subject}' and will get back to you shortly.

Your original message:
{quote_start}{text}{quote_end}

Best regards,
The MyOrderApp Team

postCustomerMe.html:
Hello,

Welcome to {merchant.squareBusinessName} on MyOrderApp!

We're thrilled to have you with us. Dive in and enjoy hassle-free ordering from {merchant.squareBusinessName}. Should you have questions or encounter any issues with your orders, don't hesitate to contact us at {supportEmail}.

Happy ordering!

Best regards,

The MyOrderApp Team
postCustomerMe.subject: Welcome to {merchant.squareBusinessName} on MyOrderApp,!
postCustomerMe.text:
Hello,

Thank you for choosing {merchant.squareBusinessName} on MyOrderApp! Explore and experience smooth and efficient ordering from us. If you need any assistance or have inquiries, please email us at {supportEmail}.

Happy shopping!

Best regards,
The MyOrderApp Team

postMerchantMe.html:
Hello {to.name},

Welcome to MyOrderApp!

We're thrilled to partner with your business. As a merchant on our platform, you have access to a wide array of tools and services designed to enhance your reach and operations. If you have questions or need assistance setting things up, please reach out to us at {supportEmail}.

Here's to growing together!

Best regards,

The MyOrderApp Team
postMerchantMe.subject: Welcome to MyOrderApp, {to.name}!
postMerchantMe.text:
Hello {to.name},

We're excited to have your business on MyOrderApp. Our platform is tailored to help merchants like you thrive. If you have any questions or need help with anything, don't hesitate to contact us at {supportEmail}.

To success and growth!

Best regards,
The MyOrderApp Team

postPasswordForgot.html:
Hey {to.name},

Looks like you've forgotten your password. No worries, it happens to the best of us.

Click the button below to reset it.

If you didn't request this, ignore this email and your password will remain unchanged.
postPasswordForgot.subject: Reset Your Password for MyOrderApp
postPasswordForgot.text: Hey {to.name}, it looks like you've requested a password reset.

postSupport.html:
Hey {to.name},

Thank you for reaching out to us with your support request regarding: '{subject}'.

Your issue has been forwarded to our development team for investigation. We understand how important this is and will aim to resolve the issue as soon as possible.

{text}

Best regards,

The MyOrderApp Support Team
postSupport.subject: MyOrderApp Support: {subject}
postSupport.text:
Hey {to.name},

Thank you for reaching out to us with your support request regarding: '{subject}'.

Your issue has been forwarded to our development team for investigation. We understand how important this is and will aim to resolve the issue as soon as possible.

Your original message:
{quote_start}{text}{quote_end}

Best regards,
The MyOrderApp Support Team

postSquarePaymentOrderCurrent.html:
Hello,

Thank you for your order with Ref #{order.displayId}. It's been submitted and we'll keep you updated on its progress.

Happy ordering!

Best regards,

The MyOrderApp Team
postSquarePaymentOrderCurrent.subject: Thank you for your order Ref #{order.displayId} on MyOrderApp!
postSquarePaymentOrderCurrent.text:
Hello,

Thank you for your order with Ref #{order.displayId} on MyOrderApp. We'll keep you informed on its status.

Best regards,
The MyOrderApp Team

onEventSquareFulfillmentUpdateCanceled.html:
Hello,

Order Ref #{order.displayId} has been canceled. If you have any questions or concerns, please get in touch with the store directly.

We're here to help.

Best regards,

The MyOrderApp Team
onEventSquareFulfillmentUpdateCanceled.subject: Order Ref #{order.displayId} Cancellation on MyOrderApp
onEventSquareFulfillmentUpdateCanceled.text:
Hello,

Your order Ref #{order.displayId} has been canceled on MyOrderApp. For further details, please contact the store directly.

Best regards,
The MyOrderApp Team

onEventSquareFulfillmentUpdateCompleted.html:

Best regards,
